perturbation.original_text: Either Party may terminate this agreement for non-cause with a sixty (60) written notice.
perturbation.changed_text: Either Party may terminate this agreement for non-cause with a thirty (30) written notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the agreement can be terminated with a sixty (60) day written notice. By reducing it to thirty (30) days in the changed text, it contradicts Section 10, which outlines specific termination clauses and, thus, introduces a conflicting term for non-cause termination. This creates uncertainty about the proper termination notice period.

perturbation.original_text: Referral Fees will be paid within thirty (30) days of the collection of receivables from the Registered Referral.
perturbation.changed_text: Referral Fees will be paid within ninety (90) days of the collection of receivables from the Registered Referral.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies that Referral Fees will be paid within thirty (30) days of collecting receivables. The change extends it to ninety (90) days, creating a contradiction regarding payment terms. It creates uncertainty about when Reseller can expect to receive Referral Fees.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement supersedes all prior agreements or discussions between the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement supplements any existing agreements or discussions between the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof.
perturbation.explanation: The original states that this agreement replaces any prior agreements. Changing it to 'supplements' directly contradicts this statement. This creates confusion as to whether prior agreements are still in effect, opening up possibility of conflicts between the terms of this agreement and prior ones.
